308 // skip buildings that are completed
309 if( e_data.provides.find( bldg ) != e_data.provides.end() ) {

312 // skip building that have unmet requirements

320 break;

322 met_requires += 1;
323 }
324 if( met_requires < needed_requires ) {
325 continue;
326 }

328 bool in_progress = false;
329 for( const auto &bp_exclude : recp.blueprint_excludes() ) {
330 // skip buildings that are excluded by previous builds
331 if( e_data.provides.find( bp_exclude.first ) != e_data.provides.end() ) {
332 if( e_data.provides[bp_exclude.first] >= bp_exclude.second ) {
333 should_display = false;
334 break;

336 }
337 // track buildings that are currently being built
338 if( e_data.in_progress.find( bp_exclude.first ) != e_data.in_progress.end() ) {
339 if( e_data.in_progress[bp_exclude.first] >= bp_exclude.second ) {
340 in_progress = true;
341 break;
342 }
343 }
344 }
345 if( !should_display ) {
346 continue;
347 }

352 data.avail = reqs.can_make_with_inventory( _inv, recp.get_component_filter(), 1 );
353 data.in_progress = in_progress;
354 ret_data.emplace_back( data );

2696 itemlist = get_gatherlist();

2701 break;
2702 case SUMMER:
2703 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_summer" );
2704 break;
2705 case AUTUMN:
2706 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_autumn" );
2707 break;
2708 case WINTER:
2709 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_winter" );
2710 break;
2711 default:
2712 debugmsg( "Invalid season" );
2713 }
2714 }

2716 hunting_results( skill, task, checks_per_cycle * mission_time / min_time, 30 );
2717 } else {
2718 search_results( skill, itemlist, checks_per_cycle * mission_time / min_time, 15 );
2719 }
2720
2721 return true;

spawn items or corpses based on search attempts

Parameters
skillskill level of the search

attemptsnumber of skill checks to make
difficultya random number from 0 to difficulty is created for each attempt, and if skill is higher, an item or corpse is spawned
